knowledge_text.runes.ansuz_rune.title: Rune of Ansuz
knowledge_text.runes.ansuz_rune.desc:
The rune of Ansuz represents sight and wisdom. It can be crafted into a magic charm able to store experience.
Any experience stored in this Orb of Knowledge may be retrieved by using it while sneaking.
knowledge_text.runes.bifrost_rune.title: Rune of Bifrost
knowledge_text.runes.bifrost_rune.desc:
While strictly speaking not a real rune, the Rune of Bifrost symbolizes the passion of the runemaker.
Amulets made from it will buff their wearer as long as they are over 75% of their maximum health.
They will also emit colorful particles similar to the equally colorful god-bridge the rune is named after.
knowledge_text.runes.raidho_rune.title: Rune of Raidho
knowledge_text.runes.raidho_rune.desc:
Raidho is the rune of the wheel. It can be applied to Minecarts in order to magically accelerate them. It can also be applied using Dispensers.
The rune can be removed by breaking the Minecart it was applied to.
knowledge_text.runes.jera_rune.title: Rune of Jera
knowledge_text.runes.jera_rune.desc:
Jera is the rune of abundance. As such, it will fertilize nearby crops.
In practice, this selects one random crop to grow every few seconds.
